analyzed: iyam sā sarva buddhānām ghaṇṭā ghoṣa anugā smṛtā tvayā api hi sadā dhāryāḥ bodhiśreṣṭa bodhi citta amṛta bho om śrī cakra bho śrī buddha kapāla mahātantrarāja ṭīkā abhayapaddhatiḥ

original: tataḥ śiṣyaśirasi vajraṃ ghaṇṭāñca sandhārayan oṃ tricakrādhipati śrīherukavīra tvāmabhiṣiñcāmi amukavajra- stvamiti paṭhediti nāma|
analyzed: tatas śiṣya śirasi vajram ghaṇṭām ca sandhārayan om tricakra adhipati śrī heruka vīra tvām abhiṣiñcāmi amuka vajraḥ stvam iti paṭhet iti nāma

original: oṃ buddhakapālini āḥ hī hai hū~ phaḍiti hṛdayaṃ pāṭhayen mantraḥ |
analyzed: om buddha kapālini āḥ hī hai hū phaṭ iti hṛdayam pāṭhayet mantraḥ
idam tat sarva buddhatvam śrī heruka pade sthitam

original: tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryaṃ śrīheruka- dṛḍhavratamiti paṭhan vajraṃ dadyāt|
analyzed: tvayā api hi sadā dhāryam śrīheruka dṛḍha vratam iti paṭhan vajram dadyāt

original: so'pi oṃ sarvatathāgatasidhdivajrasamaye tiṣṭhaiṣa tvāndhārayāmi oṃ ha ha ha ha hīḥ iti paṭhan gṛhṇīyāditi vajravratam |
analyzed: om sarva tathāgata sidhdi vajra samaye tiṣṭha eṣa tvān dhārayāmi om ha ha ha hīḥ iti paṭhan gṛhṇīyāt iti vajravratam

original: śrīherukamudreyaṃ bahiradhyātmakā sthiteti paṭhan khaṭvāṅgaḍamarūkapālani dadyāditi caryāvratam|

original: eṣo'haṃ tvāṃ tricakreśaḥ sarvabuddhamayaḥ svayaṃ śrīherukīti nāmnā vaiyyākaromi tathāgataḥ|

original: śrīherūketināma tāthāgatī siddhiḥ samayastvaṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti paṭhet vyākaraṇam|

original: nirnimittaṃ jagat kṛtya kartā yenāsmi sāmpratamityadhyeṣaṇāntaraṃ svahadraśmisamāhūtānantadigvati- vīradevībhiḥ prāgvat praviśya vajrānniḥsṛtya jñānāṃbupūrṇakalaśahastābhirmaṅgalagītipūjā- satkāravistaraiḥ secayan |

original: tatokṣobhyamaulinaṃ vicintyānyavīradevīḥ tatraiva jñānasattvarūpeṇa praveśya oṃ supratiṣṭhitavajre svāheti mantramuccaret|
analyzed: tatas ukṣobhya maulinam vicintya anya vīra devīḥ tatra eva jñāna sattva rūpeṇa praveśya om supratiṣṭhita vajre svāhā iti mantram uccaret

original: saṃsārapaṅkamagnohaṃ trātā bhava hi sundarīcchinnā vāsanā, yukto'haṃ vikalpena śrī- bho ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭala: bahulena ca |

original: prajñāpyutthāpaya svanīrajāntarālāvaśiṣṭa bodhicittamakarandavindustadānanāntarāle nirambaraiva niveśayediti prajñopāyayorguhyenābhiṣeka iti guhyam|

original: tataḥ prāgvad guruṃ prajñāṃ bāhyeṣitavantaṃ sā prajñā'nyā vā'jñāpayati |

original: yastu madhyendriyaḥ śiṣyastambāhye bhāvitaprajñāsvabhāve dharmodayākamalodare koṭiyojanamānaṃ manomayaṃ tripuṭamaṇḍalaṃ vibhāvya yathāyogamuktavidhinā'bhiṣiñcet

original: kṣamā tu kṣāmyantu jinavarā iti vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ
analyzed: kṣamā tu kṣāmyantu jina varāḥ iti vibhakti vipariṇāmaḥ
sarva tantram uktvā bhiṣiktānām e vā atra adhikāraḥ iti darśayitum paryante bhiṣeka vidhim āha
atha ityādi

atra eva prajñāyām sthitāḥ brahma ādayaḥ

original: tasyā caturdaśaḥ paṭala: yathāvidhi prajñājñānābhiṣekaṃ gṛhṇīyāt

original: taduktaṃ dvikalpe tantre- paramānande tu saṃprāpte nānātvavarjite kṣaṇe

original: yaścābhyāsād nirvedhabhāgīyādyadhigamakrameṇābhinandā samantato'bhijñā balavaiśāradyādiniratiśayaguṇaratnaiḥ samṛddhā jinānānnikhilakleśa- kalaṅkāpagamāt sundarī samantabhadrā paramaprītiḥ vasati mūrttiścaturthaḥ kāyo vajradharaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca abhyāsāt nirvedha bhāgīya ādi adhigama krameṇa abhinandā samantataḥ bhijñā bala vaiśāradya ādi niratiśaya guṇa ratnaiḥ samṛddhā kalaṅka apagamāt sundarī samantabhadrā parama prītiḥ

original: paṇḍitānāṃ samyaka saṃbuddhānāṃ hṛdi tādātmyena sakalavikalpavikṣepapratikṣepānnibhṛtaṃ kopyavāgbuddhigocaraḥ
analyzed: paṇḍitānām samyaka saṃbuddhānām hṛdi tādātmyena sakala vikalpa vikṣepa pratikṣepāt nibhṛtam kopya vāc buddhi gocaraḥ
atas eva enam adhigamya citrasena ādīnām tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthānam vakṣyati
ekaḥ dvayaḥ paramānandaḥ sarva āvaraṇa vāsanā avaśeṣa nidrā virahāt jāgarti
tasmai namaḥ

original: tadanena ślokena tadeva prajñājñānaṃ rūpaviśeṣeṇa jalamiva taraṅgarūpeṇotpannaṃ caturthobhiṣeka ityuktam
analyzed: tat anena ślokena tat eva prajñā jñānam rūpa viśeṣeṇa jalam iva taraṅga rūpeṇa utpannam caturthaḥ abhiṣekaḥ iti uktam
sa punar ayam mahā sukha mayaḥ vajradharaḥ sarva tantra nidānam iti
paṇḍita abhayākaragupta kṛtāyām abhayapaddhatyām śrī buddhakapāla mahā tantra ṭīkāyām caturdaśa paṭalaḥ samāptaḥ

original: || 14 | | * śrībuddhakapālamahātantrarājaṭīkā abhayapaddhatirnāma śrīmaddherukavīravartma vivṛteruccairudañcacchubhā- cchitvā saṃsṛtinirvṛtibhramamasau tanmaṇḍale mīlatu
analyzed: śrī buddhakapāla mahātantra rāja ṭīkā abhayapaddhatiḥ nāma śrīmat heruka vīravartma vivṛteḥ uccais udañcat śubhā cchitvā saṃsṛti nirvṛti bhramam asau tad maṇḍale mīlatu

original: loko'haṃ tu muneramuṣya bibhṛyāṃ mūrtīranantāḥ prati- prāṇiprahṛmadabhraśarma vidadhaddhvastaprapañcaściram
analyzed: lokaḥ ham tu muneḥ amuṣya bibhṛyām mūrtīḥ anantāḥ prati prāṇi prahṛma dabhra śarma vidadhat dhvasta prapañcaḥ ciram

original: || tribhavavijayalakṣmīkṣmābhirakṣīṇamūrtyā jagadatanuhitāyādvaitadharmojitasya magadhapatisutaśrīyakṣapālasya dhāmnāṃ dhṛtipariṇataye tatprārthanād granthiteyam jīyādānandakandādvayaparamarasollāsaviśrāmabhūmi-
analyzed: tri bhava vijaya lakṣmī kṣmābhiḥ akṣīṇa mūrtyā jagat a tanu hitāya advaita dharma ujitasya magadha pati suta śrī yakṣapālasya dhāmnām dhṛti pariṇataye tad prārthanāt granthitā iyam jīyāt

iti śrī buddhakapāla mahā tantra ṭīkā abhayapaddhatiḥ samāptā
paṇḍita sthavira abhayākaragupta pādānām iti
sa pāda ṣoḍaśa śloka śatī saṃpiṇḍitā pramā
